portfolio.title: Object Detection and Classification
portfolio.description: A Python script that captures video from the webcam using OpenCV, performs real-time object detection with a pre-trained model (YOLO), and provides real-time audio feedback of detected objects using gTTS (Google Text-to-Speech). The script continues running until the user presses the 'q' key to exit.

portfolio.title: Review Website
portfolio.description: A website that allows you to browse through a catalog of Movies/TV shows and rate them

portfolio.title: Beacon Health
portfolio.description: Tech meets non-profit healthcare in this platform that will help you navigate through the complexities of the American Healthcare system
